summary: "Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer" is a 2007 superhero movie, the sequel to the 2005 "Fantastic Four". Based on the comic book, it's about the Fantastic Four and Doctor Doom teaming up with the Silver Surfer to save Earth from Galactus. The film stars Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, and Michael Chiklis. It made over $301 million but didn't do as well as its predecessor. A third film was planned but canceled, and the series was later rebooted in 2015. Chris Evans, who played the Human Torch, later starred as Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
title: Fantastic Four Rise of the Silver Surfer
